description:
The Red Blood Cells have been given an important mission to fill the corpora cavernosa with blood to trigger an erection. Red Blood Cell (AA2153) is enthusiastic about the opportunity to contribute to the birth of new life, but as usual, things never go as planned in this body. He is hazed by senior Red Blood Cells and the body suffers from erectile dysfunction due to stress. With a multitude of obstacles awaiting the Red Blood Cells, will their hard work pay off?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: 興奮, 膨張, 虚無.
